sql.statement:
WITH 
-- Parameters (can be replaced with variables or substitution)
params AS (
    SELECT 
        2 AS max_idle_speed,
        3 AS min_idle_detection,
        1 AS gps_not_updated_min,
        3 AS gps_not_updated_max,
        NULL::text[] AS object_labels_filter,
        NOW()::timestamp AS time_to
),

-- Calculate derived time parameters
time_params AS (
    SELECT 
        p.*,
        p.time_to - INTERVAL '24 hours' AS time_from,
        DATE_TRUNC('day', p.time_to) AS start_of_selected_day,
        DATE_TRUNC('day', p.time_to) - INTERVAL '1 day' AS previous_day
    FROM params p
),

-- Device list with optional filtering
device_list AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT o.device_id 
    FROM raw_business_data.objects o
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE o.is_deleted IS NOT TRUE
      AND (tp.object_labels_filter IS NULL 
           OR o.object_label = ANY(tp.object_labels_filter))
),

-- Base data from device_daily_snapshots for the target date
daily_snapshots AS (
    SELECT 
        dds.device_id,
        dds.device_time,
        dds.platform_time,
        dds.latitude,
        dds.longitude,
        dds.speed,
        dds.altitude,
        dds.event_id,
        'parked' AS moving_status,
        'offline' AS connection_status,
        to_char(dds.device_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_connect_formatted
    FROM business_data.device_daily_snapshots dds
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE dds.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND dds.device_time < tp.start_of_selected_day
),

-- Fresh data from tracking_data_core for the same day
tracking_data_core AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (tdc.device_id) 
        tdc.device_id,
        tdc.device_time,
        tdc.platform_time,
        tdc.latitude,
        tdc.longitude,
        tdc.speed,
        tdc.altitude,
        tdc.event_id
    FROM raw_telematics_data.tracking_data_core tdc
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE tdc.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND tdc.event_id IN (2, 802, 803, 804, 811)
      AND tdc.device_time < tp.time_to
      AND tdc.device_time >= tp.time_from
    ORDER BY tdc.device_id, tdc.device_time DESC
),

-- Inputs data
inputs_data AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (i.device_id) * 
    FROM raw_telematics_data.inputs i
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE i.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND i.event_id IN (2, 802, 803, 804, 811)
      AND i.device_time < tp.time_to
      AND i.device_time >= tp.time_from
    ORDER BY i.device_id, i.device_time DESC
),

-- Recent states
recent_states AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (s.device_id)
        s.device_id,
        s.event_id,
        s.device_time,
        s.record_added_at,
        s.state_name,
        CAST(s.value AS integer) AS is_moving
    FROM raw_telematics_data.states s
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE s.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND s.device_time < tp.time_to
      AND s.device_time >= tp.time_from
      AND s.event_id IN (2, 802, 803, 804, 811)
      AND s.state_name = 'moving'
    ORDER BY s.device_id, s.device_time DESC
),

-- Battery inputs data
batery_inputs_data AS (
    SELECT i.device_id, i.device_time, i.value
    FROM inputs_data i
    JOIN raw_business_data.sensor_description sd 
        ON sd.input_label = i.sensor_name 
        AND sd.device_id = i.device_id
    WHERE sd.sensor_type = 'battery'
),

-- Combine daily snapshots with fresh tracking data
combined_data AS (
    SELECT 
        dl.device_id,
        COALESCE(tdc.event_id, ds.event_id) AS event_id,
        COALESCE(tdc.platform_time, ds.platform_time) AS platform_time,
        COALESCE(tdc.speed, ds.speed, 0) / 100 AS speed,
        COALESCE(tdc.latitude, ds.latitude) / 1e7 AS latitude,
        COALESCE(tdc.longitude, ds.longitude) / 1e7 AS longitude,
        COALESCE(tdc.altitude, ds.altitude) / 1e7 AS altitude,
        COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) AS device_time,
        CASE 
            WHEN COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) IS NULL THEN NULL
            WHEN tdc.device_id IS NOT NULL THEN
                CASE 
                    WHEN (COALESCE(tdc.speed, ds.speed, 0) / 100 > tp.max_idle_speed 
                          AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 < tp.min_idle_detection)
                          OR rs.is_moving = 1 
                        THEN 'moving'
                    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 < tp.min_idle_detection 
                        THEN 'stopped'
                    ELSE 'parked'
                END
            ELSE ds.moving_status
        END AS moving_status,
        CASE 
            WHEN COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) IS NULL THEN 'no signal'
            WHEN tdc.device_id IS NOT NULL THEN
                CASE 
                    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 <= tp.gps_not_updated_min 
                        THEN 'online'
                    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 <= tp.gps_not_updated_max 
                        THEN 'standby'
                    ELSE 'offline'
                END
            ELSE ds.connection_status
        END AS connection_status,
        to_char(COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_connect_formatted
    FROM time_params tp
    CROSS JOIN device_list dl
    LEFT JOIN daily_snapshots ds ON dl.device_id = ds.device_id
    LEFT JOIN tracking_data_core tdc ON dl.device_id = tdc.device_id
    LEFT JOIN recent_states rs 
        ON dl.device_id = rs.device_id 
        AND COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) = rs.device_time
),

-- Latest data per device
latest_data AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_id) *
    FROM combined_data
    ORDER BY device_id, device_time DESC NULLS LAST
),

-- Latest data with geo information
latest_data_with_geo AS (
    SELECT 
        ld.*, 
        zg.zone_label,
        'https://maps.google.com/?q=' || ld.latitude || ',' || ld.longitude AS google_maps_link
    FROM latest_data ld 
    LEFT JOIN business_data.zones_geom zg
        ON ST_DWithin(
            ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(ld.longitude::float8, ld.latitude::float8), 4326)::geography,
            zg.zone_geom,
            0
        )
)


-- Final result
SELECT
    count(o.object_label)
FROM raw_business_data.objects AS o
LEFT JOIN latest_data_with_geo ld ON o.device_id = ld.device_id
LEFT JOIN batery_inputs_data b 
    ON ld.device_id = b.device_id 
    AND ld.device_time = b.device_time
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.employees AS e ON o.object_id = e.object_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.groups AS g ON o.group_id = g.group_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.devices AS d ON d.device_id = ld.device_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.vehicles AS v ON v.object_id = o.object_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.garages AS ga ON v.garage_id = ga.garage_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.departments AS dp ON e.department_id = dp.department_id
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (object_id) *
    FROM raw_business_data.driver_history
    ORDER BY object_id, record_added_at DESC
) dh ON dh.object_id = o.object_id
WHERE o.is_deleted IS NOT true
AND ld.connection_status = 'online'

        DATE_TRUNC('day', p.time_to) - INTERVAL '1 day' AS previous_day
    FROM params p
),

-- Device list with optional filtering
device_list AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT o.device_id 
    FROM raw_business_data.objects o
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE o.is_deleted IS NOT TRUE
      AND (tp.object_labels_filter IS NULL 
           OR o.object_label = ANY(tp.object_labels_filter))
),

-- Base data from device_daily_snapshots for the target date
daily_snapshots AS (
    SELECT 
        dds.device_id,
        dds.device_time,
        dds.platform_time,
        dds.latitude,
        dds.longitude,
        dds.speed,
        dds.altitude,
        dds.event_id,
        'parked' AS moving_status,
        'offline' AS connection_status,
        to_char(dds.device_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_connect_formatted
    FROM business_data.device_daily_snapshots dds
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE dds.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND dds.device_time < tp.start_of_selected_day
),

-- Fresh data from tracking_data_core for the same day
tracking_data_core AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (tdc.device_id) 
        tdc.device_id,
        tdc.device_time,
        tdc.platform_time,
        tdc.latitude,
        tdc.longitude,
        tdc.speed,
        tdc.altitude,
        tdc.event_id
    FROM raw_telematics_data.tracking_data_core tdc
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE tdc.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND tdc.event_id IN (2, 802, 803, 804, 811)
      AND tdc.device_time < tp.time_to
      AND tdc.device_time >= tp.time_from
    ORDER BY tdc.device_id, tdc.device_time DESC
),

-- Inputs data
inputs_data AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (i.device_id) * 
    FROM raw_telematics_data.inputs i
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE i.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND i.event_id IN (2, 802, 803, 804, 811)
      AND i.device_time < tp.time_to
      AND i.device_time >= tp.time_from
    ORDER BY i.device_id, i.device_time DESC
),

-- Recent states
recent_states AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (s.device_id)
        s.device_id,
        s.event_id,
        s.device_time,
        s.record_added_at,
        s.state_name,
        CAST(s.value AS integer) AS is_moving
    FROM raw_telematics_data.states s
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE s.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND s.device_time < tp.time_to
      AND s.device_time >= tp.time_from
      AND s.event_id IN (2, 802, 803, 804, 811)
      AND s.state_name = 'moving'
    ORDER BY s.device_id, s.device_time DESC
),

-- Battery inputs data
batery_inputs_data AS (
    SELECT i.device_id, i.device_time, i.value
    FROM inputs_data i
    JOIN raw_business_data.sensor_description sd 
        ON sd.input_label = i.sensor_name 
        AND sd.device_id = i.device_id
    WHERE sd.sensor_type = 'battery'
),

-- Combine daily snapshots with fresh tracking data
combined_data AS (
    SELECT 
        dl.device_id,
        COALESCE(tdc.event_id, ds.event_id) AS event_id,
        COALESCE(tdc.platform_time, ds.platform_time) AS platform_time,
        COALESCE(tdc.speed, ds.speed, 0) / 100 AS speed,
        COALESCE(tdc.latitude, ds.latitude) / 1e7 AS latitude,
        COALESCE(tdc.longitude, ds.longitude) / 1e7 AS longitude,
        COALESCE(tdc.altitude, ds.altitude) / 1e7 AS altitude,
        COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) AS device_time,
        CASE 
            WHEN COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) IS NULL THEN NULL
            WHEN tdc.device_id IS NOT NULL THEN
                CASE 
                    WHEN (COALESCE(tdc.speed, ds.speed, 0) / 100 > tp.max_idle_speed 
                          AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 < tp.min_idle_detection)
                          OR rs.is_moving = 1 
                        THEN 'moving'
                    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 < tp.min_idle_detection 
                        THEN 'stopped'
                    ELSE 'parked'
                END
            ELSE ds.moving_status
        END AS moving_status,
        CASE 
            WHEN COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) IS NULL THEN 'no signal'
            WHEN tdc.device_id IS NOT NULL THEN
                CASE 
                    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 <= tp.gps_not_updated_min 
                        THEN 'online'
                    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 <= tp.gps_not_updated_max 
                        THEN 'standby'
                    ELSE 'offline'
                END
            ELSE ds.connection_status
        END AS connection_status,
        to_char(COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_connect_formatted
    FROM time_params tp
    CROSS JOIN device_list dl
    LEFT JOIN daily_snapshots ds ON dl.device_id = ds.device_id
    LEFT JOIN tracking_data_core tdc ON dl.device_id = tdc.device_id
    LEFT JOIN recent_states rs 
        ON dl.device_id = rs.device_id 
        AND COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) = rs.device_time
),

-- Latest data per device
latest_data AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_id) *
    FROM combined_data
    ORDER BY device_id, device_time DESC NULLS LAST
),

-- Latest data with geo information
latest_data_with_geo AS (
    SELECT 
        ld.*, 
        zg.zone_label,
        'https://maps.google.com/?q=' || ld.latitude || ',' || ld.longitude AS google_maps_link
    FROM latest_data ld 
    LEFT JOIN business_data.zones_geom zg
        ON ST_DWithin(
            ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(ld.longitude::float8, ld.latitude::float8), 4326)::geography,
            zg.zone_geom,
            0
        )
)

    FROM raw_business_data.driver_history
    ORDER BY object_id, record_added_at DESC
) dh ON dh.object_id = o.object_id
WHERE o.is_deleted IS NOT true
AND ld.moving_status = 'moving'

           OR o.object_label = ANY(tp.object_labels_filter))
),

-- Base data from device_daily_snapshots for the target date
daily_snapshots AS (
    SELECT 
        dds.device_id,
        dds.device_time,
        dds.platform_time,
        dds.latitude,
        dds.longitude,
        dds.speed,
        dds.altitude,
        dds.event_id,
        'parked' AS moving_status,
        'offline' AS connection_status,
        to_char(dds.device_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_connect_formatted
    FROM business_data.device_daily_snapshots dds
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE dds.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND dds.device_time < tp.start_of_selected_day
),

-- Fresh data from tracking_data_core for the same day
tracking_data_core AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (tdc.device_id) 
        tdc.device_id,
        tdc.device_time,
        tdc.platform_time,
        tdc.latitude,
        tdc.longitude,
        tdc.speed,
        tdc.altitude,
        tdc.event_id
    FROM raw_telematics_data.tracking_data_core tdc
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE tdc.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND tdc.event_id IN (2, 802, 803, 804, 811)
      AND tdc.device_time < tp.time_to
      AND tdc.device_time >= tp.time_from
    ORDER BY tdc.device_id, tdc.device_time DESC
),

-- Inputs data
inputs_data AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (i.device_id) * 
    FROM raw_telematics_data.inputs i
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE i.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND i.event_id IN (2, 802, 803, 804, 811)
      AND i.device_time < tp.time_to
      AND i.device_time >= tp.time_from
    ORDER BY i.device_id, i.device_time DESC
),

-- Recent states
recent_states AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (s.device_id)
        s.device_id,
        s.event_id,
        s.device_time,
        s.record_added_at,
        s.state_name,
        CAST(s.value AS integer) AS is_moving
    FROM raw_telematics_data.states s
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE s.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND s.device_time < tp.time_to
      AND s.device_time >= tp.time_from
      AND s.event_id IN (2, 802, 803, 804, 811)
      AND s.state_name = 'moving'
    ORDER BY s.device_id, s.device_time DESC
),

-- Battery inputs data
batery_inputs_data AS (
    SELECT i.device_id, i.device_time, i.value
    FROM inputs_data i
    JOIN raw_business_data.sensor_description sd 
        ON sd.input_label = i.sensor_name 
        AND sd.device_id = i.device_id
    WHERE sd.sensor_type = 'battery'
),

-- Combine daily snapshots with fresh tracking data
combined_data AS (
    SELECT 
        dl.device_id,
        COALESCE(tdc.event_id, ds.event_id) AS event_id,
        COALESCE(tdc.platform_time, ds.platform_time) AS platform_time,
        COALESCE(tdc.speed, ds.speed, 0) / 100 AS speed,
        COALESCE(tdc.latitude, ds.latitude) / 1e7 AS latitude,
        COALESCE(tdc.longitude, ds.longitude) / 1e7 AS longitude,
        COALESCE(tdc.altitude, ds.altitude) / 1e7 AS altitude,
        COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) AS device_time,
        CASE 
            WHEN COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) IS NULL THEN NULL
            WHEN tdc.device_id IS NOT NULL THEN
                CASE 
                    WHEN (COALESCE(tdc.speed, ds.speed, 0) / 100 > tp.max_idle_speed 
                          AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 < tp.min_idle_detection)
                          OR rs.is_moving = 1 
                        THEN 'moving'
                    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 < tp.min_idle_detection 
                        THEN 'stopped'
                    ELSE 'parked'
                END
            ELSE ds.moving_status
        END AS moving_status,
        CASE 
            WHEN COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) IS NULL THEN 'no signal'
            WHEN tdc.device_id IS NOT NULL THEN
                CASE 
                    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 <= tp.gps_not_updated_min 
                        THEN 'online'
                    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 <= tp.gps_not_updated_max 
                        THEN 'standby'
                    ELSE 'offline'
                END
            ELSE ds.connection_status
        END AS connection_status,
        to_char(COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_connect_formatted
    FROM time_params tp
    CROSS JOIN device_list dl
    LEFT JOIN daily_snapshots ds ON dl.device_id = ds.device_id
    LEFT JOIN tracking_data_core tdc ON dl.device_id = tdc.device_id
    LEFT JOIN recent_states rs 
        ON dl.device_id = rs.device_id 
        AND COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) = rs.device_time
),

-- Latest data per device
latest_data AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_id) *
    FROM combined_data
    ORDER BY device_id, device_time DESC NULLS LAST
),

-- Latest data with geo information
latest_data_with_geo AS (
    SELECT 
        ld.*, 
        zg.zone_label,
        'https://maps.google.com/?q=' || ld.latitude || ',' || ld.longitude AS google_maps_link
    FROM latest_data ld 
    LEFT JOIN business_data.zones_geom zg
        ON ST_DWithin(
            ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(ld.longitude::float8, ld.latitude::float8), 4326)::geography,
            zg.zone_geom,
            0
        )
)

-- Final result
SELECT
    count(o.object_label)
FROM raw_business_data.objects AS o
LEFT JOIN latest_data_with_geo ld ON o.device_id = ld.device_id
LEFT JOIN batery_inputs_data b 
    ON ld.device_id = b.device_id 
    AND ld.device_time = b.device_time
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.employees AS e ON o.object_id = e.object_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.groups AS g ON o.group_id = g.group_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.devices AS d ON d.device_id = ld.device_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.vehicles AS v ON v.object_id = o.object_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.garages AS ga ON v.garage_id = ga.garage_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.departments AS dp ON e.department_id = dp.department_id
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (object_id) *
    FROM raw_business_data.driver_history
    ORDER BY object_id, record_added_at DESC
) dh ON dh.object_id = o.object_id
WHERE o.is_deleted IS NOT true
AND ld.connection_status = 'no signal';

batery_inputs_data AS (

        )

-- Final result

FROM raw_business_data.objects AS o

LEFT JOIN (

    ORDER BY object_id, record_added_at DESC
) dh ON dh.object_id = o.object_id
WHERE o.is_deleted IS NOT true
AND ld.moving_status = 'stopped'

LEFT JOIN batery_inputs_data b

        p.time_to - INTERVAL '24 hours' AS time_from,
        DATE_TRUNC('day', p.time_to) AS start_of_selected_day,
        DATE_TRUNC('day', p.time_to) - INTERVAL '1 day' AS previous_day
    FROM params p
),

-- Device list with optional filtering
device_list AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT o.device_id 
    FROM raw_business_data.objects o
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE o.is_deleted IS NOT TRUE
      AND (tp.object_labels_filter IS NULL 
           OR o.object_label = ANY(tp.object_labels_filter))
),

-- Base data from device_daily_snapshots for the target date
daily_snapshots AS (
    SELECT 
        dds.device_id,
        dds.device_time,
        dds.platform_time,
        dds.latitude,
        dds.longitude,
        dds.speed,
        dds.altitude,
        dds.event_id,
        'parked' AS moving_status,
        'offline' AS connection_status,
        to_char(dds.device_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_connect_formatted
    FROM business_data.device_daily_snapshots dds
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE dds.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND dds.device_time < tp.start_of_selected_day
),

-- Fresh data from tracking_data_core for the same day
tracking_data_core AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (tdc.device_id) 
        tdc.device_id,
        tdc.device_time,
        tdc.platform_time,
        tdc.latitude,
        tdc.longitude,
        tdc.speed,
        tdc.altitude,
        tdc.event_id
    FROM raw_telematics_data.tracking_data_core tdc
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE tdc.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND tdc.event_id IN (2, 802, 803, 804, 811)
      AND tdc.device_time < tp.time_to
      AND tdc.device_time >= tp.time_from
    ORDER BY tdc.device_id, tdc.device_time DESC
),

-- Inputs data
inputs_data AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (i.device_id) * 
    FROM raw_telematics_data.inputs i
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE i.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND i.event_id IN (2, 802, 803, 804, 811)
      AND i.device_time < tp.time_to
      AND i.device_time >= tp.time_from
    ORDER BY i.device_id, i.device_time DESC
),

-- Recent states
recent_states AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (s.device_id)
        s.device_id,
        s.event_id,
        s.device_time,
        s.record_added_at,
        s.state_name,
        CAST(s.value AS integer) AS is_moving
    FROM raw_telematics_data.states s
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE s.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND s.device_time < tp.time_to
      AND s.device_time >= tp.time_from
      AND s.event_id IN (2, 802, 803, 804, 811)
      AND s.state_name = 'moving'
    ORDER BY s.device_id, s.device_time DESC
),

-- Battery inputs data
batery_inputs_data AS (
    SELECT i.device_id, i.device_time, i.value
    FROM inputs_data i
    JOIN raw_business_data.sensor_description sd 
        ON sd.input_label = i.sensor_name 
        AND sd.device_id = i.device_id
    WHERE sd.sensor_type = 'battery'
),

-- Combine daily snapshots with fresh tracking data
combined_data AS (
    SELECT 
        dl.device_id,
        COALESCE(tdc.event_id, ds.event_id) AS event_id,
        COALESCE(tdc.platform_time, ds.platform_time) AS platform_time,
        COALESCE(tdc.speed, ds.speed, 0) / 100 AS speed,
        COALESCE(tdc.latitude, ds.latitude) / 1e7 AS latitude,
        COALESCE(tdc.longitude, ds.longitude) / 1e7 AS longitude,
        COALESCE(tdc.altitude, ds.altitude) / 1e7 AS altitude,
        COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) AS device_time,
        CASE 
            WHEN COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) IS NULL THEN 'no data'
            WHEN tdc.device_id IS NOT NULL THEN
                CASE 
                    WHEN (COALESCE(tdc.speed, ds.speed, 0) / 100 > tp.max_idle_speed 
                          AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 < tp.min_idle_detection)
                          OR rs.is_moving = 1 
                        THEN 'moving'
                    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 < tp.min_idle_detection 
                        THEN 'stopped'
                    ELSE 'parked'
                END
            ELSE ds.moving_status
        END AS moving_status,
        CASE 
            WHEN COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) IS NULL THEN 'no signal'
            WHEN tdc.device_id IS NOT NULL THEN
                CASE 
                    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 <= tp.gps_not_updated_min 
                        THEN 'online'
                    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (tp.time_to - COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time))) / 60 <= tp.gps_not_updated_max 
                        THEN 'standby'
                    ELSE 'offline'
                END
            ELSE ds.connection_status
        END AS connection_status,
        to_char(COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_connect_formatted
    FROM time_params tp
    CROSS JOIN device_list dl
    LEFT JOIN daily_snapshots ds ON dl.device_id = ds.device_id
    LEFT JOIN tracking_data_core tdc ON dl.device_id = tdc.device_id
    LEFT JOIN recent_states rs 
        ON dl.device_id = rs.device_id 
        AND COALESCE(tdc.device_time, ds.device_time) = rs.device_time
),

-- Latest data per device
latest_data AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_id) *
    FROM combined_data
    ORDER BY device_id, device_time DESC NULLS LAST
),

-- Latest data with geo information
latest_data_with_geo AS (
    SELECT 
        ld.*, 
        zg.zone_label,
        'https://maps.google.com/?q=' || ld.latitude || ',' || ld.longitude AS google_maps_link
    FROM latest_data ld 
    LEFT JOIN business_data.zones_geom zg
        ON ST_DWithin(
            ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(ld.longitude::float8, ld.latitude::float8), 4326)::geography,
            zg.zone_geom,
            0
        )
)
-- Final result
SELECT
    ld.moving_status,
    count(o.object_label)
FROM raw_business_data.objects AS o
LEFT JOIN latest_data_with_geo ld ON o.device_id = ld.device_id
LEFT JOIN batery_inputs_data b 
    ON ld.device_id = b.device_id 
    AND ld.device_time = b.device_time
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.employees AS e ON o.object_id = e.object_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.groups AS g ON o.group_id = g.group_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.devices AS d ON d.device_id = ld.device_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.vehicles AS v ON v.object_id = o.object_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.garages AS ga ON v.garage_id = ga.garage_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.departments AS dp ON e.department_id = dp.department_id
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (object_id) *
    FROM raw_business_data.driver_history
    ORDER BY object_id, record_added_at DESC
) dh ON dh.object_id = o.object_id
WHERE o.is_deleted IS NOT TRUE
GROUP BY ld.moving_status;

WITH 
-- Parameters (can be replaced with variables or substitution)
params AS (
    SELECT 
        2 AS max_idle_speed,
        3 AS min_idle_detection,
        1 AS gps_not_updated_min,
        3 AS gps_not_updated_max,
        NULL::text[] AS object_labels_filter,
        NOW()::timestamp AS time_to
),

-- Calculate derived time parameters
time_params AS (
    SELECT 
        p.*,
        p.time_to - INTERVAL '24 hours' AS time_from,
        DATE_TRUNC('day', p.time_to) AS start_of_selected_day,
        DATE_TRUNC('day', p.time_to) - INTERVAL '1 day' AS previous_day

-- Device list with optional filtering

    FROM raw_telematics_data.states s
    CROSS JOIN time_params tp
    WHERE s.device_id IN (SELECT dl.device_id FROM device_list dl)
      AND s.device_time < tp.time_to
      AND s.device_time >= tp.time_from

        COALESCE(tdc.latitude, ds.latitude) / 1e7 AS latitude,

        CASE

LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.employees AS e ON o.object_id = e.object_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.groups AS g ON o.group_id = g.group_id
LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.devices AS d ON d.device_id = ld.device_id

    SELECT DISTINCT ON (object_id) *
